function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unauthorized sharing of content","Impact":"Loss of control over distribution","Mitigation":"Implement strict access controls and permissions","Technologies":"Digital rights management systems","People":"Readers, researchers, and organizations","Owner":"Publishers, copyright holders"},{"Description":"Unauthorized reproduction of content","Impact":"Loss of revenue and attribution","Mitigation":"Use watermarks and copyright notices","Technologies":"Digital watermarking technology","People":"Publishers, authors, and content creators","Owner":"Copyright holders, content creators"},{"Description":"Unrestricted individual use","Impact":"Potential misuse of content","Mitigation":"Educate users on copyright law and fair use","Technologies":"Educational materials and copyright awareness campaigns","People":"Individual users and researchers","Owner":"Copyright holders, educational institutions"}]}
